!Trader Jakal: Ah, you mean the Neruga axe blade? Yes, 1,000 adena. No need to be surprised. You didn't think that I would give it to you for free, did you? No way! I am a merchant. It's a reasonable price for such a precious symbol of the Neruga tribe spirit. If you don't agree, then leave! [Quest _232_TestOfLord 30558-03a.htm|Pay]
